tool_description: The API returns the number of days,  hours, working days, working hours, wages, weekend days, and the list of public holidays of the requested date period and country. You can also add any number of working days or working hours to a given date. 50 countries and over 230 regional calendars are supported and we work hard to keep our database up to date by following government announcements regarding public holidays changes. All the calendars can be fully customized from our friendly working da...
name: Working days
title: Working days

api_list.name: /1.3/get_info_day
api_list.description: Get detailed information about a specific day.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date to analyze (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

utterances.utterance: Can you give me detailed information about the day December 25, 2023 in the US?
What is the working day status for March 15, 2024 in Canada?
Tell me about the public holidays and working hours on July 4, 2023 in the US using the Federal holidays configuration.
I want to know if January 1, 2024 is a working day in the UK.
Please provide details for October 31, 2023 in Australia with the default configuration.
Is April 1, 2024 a public holiday in Germany? Give me the info for that day.
Get me the working day details for November 11, 2023 in France using the 'Federal holidays' configuration.
What are the working hours and weekend days on September 5, 2023 in Japan?
Show me the public holidays and working days info for June 14, 2024 in Brazil.
I need detailed info about the day February 29, 2024 in the US with a custom profile ID '12345'.

api_list.name: /1.3/delete_custom_period
api_list.description: Removing a previously defined custom period

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the custom period (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: The ID of the calendar we are customizing.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the custom period (YYYY-MM-DD) If omitted, end date will be equal to start date (one day custom period)

utterances.utterance: Please remove the custom period starting on 2023-05-01 for profile ID CB7EF3.
Delete the custom period from 2024-01-15 to 2024-01-20 for calendar profile CB7EF3.
I want to remove the custom period starting on 2022-12-31 for profile ID CB7EF3.
Can you delete the custom period from 2023-07-10 to 2023-07-15 for profile CB7EF3?
Remove the custom period starting on 2023-03-05 for the calendar profile CB7EF3.
Please delete the custom period from 2023-11-01 to 2023-11-07 for profile ID CB7EF3.
I need to remove the custom period starting on 2024-04-20 for profile CB7EF3.
Delete the custom period from 2023-09-15 to 2023-09-18 for calendar profile CB7EF3.
Remove the custom period starting on 2023-06-01 for profile ID CB7EF3.
Please delete the custom period from 2023-08-25 to 2023-08-30 for profile CB7EF3.

api_list.name: /1.3/analyse
api_list.description: Analyse a period (you provide a start_date and an end_date over a given calendar, we respond with the period analysis)

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: The end date's time (24 hours format, like 09:00 or 15:00, but not 3pm).If omitted, default value is 23:59.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start date's time (24 hours format, like 09:00 or 15:00, but not 3pm).If omitted, default value is 00:00

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

utterances.utterance: How many working days are there in the US from 2024-01-01 to 2024-01-31?
Analyze the period from 2023-12-20 to 2024-01-10 in Canada and tell me the number of working hours.
What are the public holidays in Germany between 2024-04-01 and 2024-04-30?
Calculate the working days and weekend days in the UK from 2023-11-01 to 2023-11-15.
Give me the working hours and wages for France from 2024-05-01 to 2024-05-10.
How many working days are there in Australia between 2023-09-15 and 2023-09-30 with a start time of 08:00 and end time of 17:00?
Analyze the working days in Japan from 2024-02-01 to 2024-02-28 using the Federal holidays configuration.
What is the number of working days and public holidays in Brazil from 2023-10-01 to 2023-10-31?
Calculate the working days and weekend days in South Africa from 2024-03-01 to 2024-03-15.
How many working hours are there in India between 2023-12-01 and 2023-12-31 with a start time of 09:00 and end time of 18:00?

api_list.name: /1.3/add_working_hours
api_list.description: Add an amount of working time to a given start date/time

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start time in a 24 hours format with leading zeros.

parameters.name: increment_time
parameters.description: The amount of working time to be added (or removed) to the start date time. Format H:i. This amount cannot exceed 5000 hours. For example, to add one hour: 1:00. To add 30 hours and 15 minutes: 30:15.  To remove 45 minutes: -0:45

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

utterances.utterance: Add 5 working hours to the start date 2024-06-01 at 09:00 in the US using the Federal holidays configuration.
Calculate the date and time after adding 2 hours and 30 minutes to 2024-07-15 starting at 08:15 in Canada.
What is the resulting date and time if I add 10 working hours to 2024-05-20 at 07:45 in Germany?
Starting from 2024-08-10 at 14:00 in the UK, add 3 hours and 15 minutes of working time using the Bank holidays configuration.
Add negative 45 minutes to the start date 2024-09-01 at 10:30 in Australia to find the adjusted working time.
From 2024-11-05 at 08:00 in France, add 7 working hours using the Federal holidays configuration.
Calculate the new date and time after adding 4 hours to 2024-12-12 at 13:45 in Japan.
Add 1 hour and 20 minutes to the start date 2024-10-22 at 09:15 in Brazil using the default configuration.
Starting at 2024-04-18 07:00 in Italy, add 6 working hours with the Federal holidays configuration.
From 2024-03-30 at 15:30 in South Africa, add 8 hours and 45 minutes of working time.

api_list.name: /1.3/list_non_working_days
api_list.description: List the non working days (weekend days, public holidays and custom dates) between two dates in chronlogical order.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

utterances.utterance: Can you list all the non working days in the US from 2024-01-01 to 2024-01-31?
Show me the public holidays and weekends in Canada between 2023-12-20 and 2024-01-10.
What are the non working days in Germany from 2024-04-01 to 2024-04-30 using the 'Bavaria' configuration?
List all non working days in Australia from 2023-11-15 to 2023-12-15 with the 'Federal holidays' configuration.
Give me the non working days in the UK between 2024-05-01 and 2024-05-31.
What are the weekend days and public holidays in Japan from 2024-07-01 to 2024-07-31?
Show non working days in India from 2023-10-01 to 2023-10-31 using the 'National holidays' configuration.
List all non working days in Brazil between 2024-02-01 and 2024-02-28.
Can you provide the non working days in South Africa from 2023-12-01 to 2023-12-31?
What are the non working days in France between 2024-03-01 and 2024-03-31 with the 'Federal holidays' configuration?

api_list.name: /1.3/define_custom_period
api_list.description: Defining a custom period (typically days of vacations of an employee or days of annual closure of a company) can be done from the working days websites user interface but can also be done programmatically from the API. A typical use case would be to retrieve the vacations of the workers out of the human ressources software and insert them into a custom calendar, then being able to query available working days.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A textual description of the custom period (up to 30 caracters)

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: The ID of the calendar we are customizing.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the custom period (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: The color of custom period when displayed on the calendar. Colors can be useful in order to classify custom periods. Default value is orange.

parameters.name: start_morning
parameters.description: Does the custom period starts in the morning of the start_date? Default value is true. (This parameter can be used if you want to create half day custom periods.)

parameters.name: end_afternoon
parameters.description: Does the custom period ends in the afternoon of the end_date? Default value is true. (This parameter can be used if you want to create half day custom periods.)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the custom period (YYYY-MM-DD) If omitted, end date will be equal to start date (one day custom period)

utterances.utterance: Create a custom period called Summer Vacation for profile ID CB7EF3 starting on 2024-07-01.

parameters.description: Summer Vacation

utterances.utterance: Define a custom period named Company Closure for profile ID CB7EF3 starting on 2024-12-24 and ending on 2024-12-31 with the color red.

parameters.description: Company Closure

parameters.description: Employee Training

parameters.description: Half Day Off

parameters.description: Project Deadline

utterances.utterance: Define a custom period named Annual Leave for profile CB7EF3 starting on 2024-08-15 and ending on 2024-08-22 with color blue.

parameters.description: Annual Leave

parameters.description: Medical Leave

parameters.description: Conference

api_list.name: /1.3/add_working_days
api_list.description: Add (or remove) any number of working days to a date.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: increment
parameters.description: The number of working days you want to add to your start date (positive or negative integer but not zero)

parameters.name: include_start
parameters.description: Should the count include the start_date? Default value is true. If you set include_start to false ("false" or "0"), the count will start at the next working day (or previous working day, if increment is negative)

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

utterances.utterance: How many working days will it be if I add 5 working days to the start date 2024-07-01 in the US?
Add 10 working days to the date 2024-01-15 in Canada and tell me the resulting date.
If I subtract 3 working days from 2024-05-20 in the UK, what date do I get?
Starting from 2024-09-10 in Germany, add 7 working days excluding the start date. What is the new date?
Add 15 working days to 2024-03-01 in Australia including the start date and tell me the final date.
What date do I get if I add 20 working days to 2024-11-05 in France using the 'Federal holidays' configuration?
Calculate the date after adding 8 working days to 2024-08-15 in Japan with the default configuration.
From 2024-12-01 in Brazil, subtract 4 working days including the start date. What is the resulting date?
Add 12 working days to 2024-06-10 in India excluding the start date and provide the new date.
What date results from adding 6 working days to 2024-04-20 in South Africa?
